name: Hard to make a romantic cartoon!
name_original: Hard to make a romantic cartoon!
description:
◆What kind of game is "hard to make a romantic cartoon!"◆
"hard to make a romantic cartoon!" is a Visual Novel-style BL game.
The player becomes the main character "Yunjae" and can enjoy the journey with him.
Only your choice can change his future.

◆ Plot ◆
Yunjae possesses the body of a character in a romantic comic.
The character he possesses is a supporting character called Doyeong,
the sickly brother of the story’s heroine, Dohui.
Doyeong, a victim of bullying, meets a tragic end and eventually commits suicide.
In order to survive,
Yunjae tries to change the plot of the story…
Will he be able to go back to his original world?

◆ Character ◆
→ Cha Doyeong
The main character of the story.
A sickly and bullied side character of a romantic comic possessed by a college student.
His original name is Cheon Yunjae.
Lively and cheerful. Has a driven personality.
Hopes to change the tragic ending of the original story to survive.
Wants everyone to live ‘happily ever after’.
→ Cheon Yunjae
A college student who loves reading romantic comics.
The main character’s original self.
Shares the same personality with the main character but is a bit more calm.
Agonizes over choosing between reality and the cartoon world. What will his eventual choice be?
→ Gang Hyeon
The student president of Kangsung High School.
Successor of conglomerate ‘Kangsung Group’.
The heir of a well-off family.
Cold-blooded and harsh personality who ruthlessly deals with people that annoy him.
Enjoys the fun of being involved in power play.
Approaches the main character for fun, but somehow gradually falls for him….
→ Lee Jinha
A transfer student who appeared out of nowhere.
Gentle and amiable only to the main character.
Indifferent and wary of those around him.
Became very fond of the main character after getting help from him.
Even transferred schools in order to stay close to him.
→ Ha Sangwoo
Head of the bullies that pick on the main character.
Seems like there's a reason why he keeps pestering the main character....
